summary: In 1920s China, a bandit arrives in a remote provincial town posing as its new mayor, where he faces off against a tyrannical local nobleman.
cast: Yun-Fat Chow|You Ge|Wen Jiang|Carina Lau|Jun Hu|Pu Miao|Wu Jiang|Fan Liao|Yun Zhou|Kun Chen|Mo Zhang|Bing Bai|Lei Chen|Yiheng Du|Xiaogang Feng|Ming Hu|Jing Li|Marco Ma|Yu Sha|Bing Shao|Adam S. Shen|Qiangxin Wang|Xiao Wei|Xiang Wen|Xiguo Wu|Rui Yang|Lu Yao|Ming Zhao
title: Rang zi dan fei
